import "./works.scss" import { useState } from "react" export default function Works() { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide]=useState(0) const data=[ { id:"1", icon: "./assets/cell-phone.png", title: "Web Design", desc: "description here", img: "./assets/site.png" }, { id:"2", icon: "./assets/cell-phone.png", title: "item 2", desc: "description here", img: "./assets/site.png" }, { id:"3", icon: "./assets/cell-phone.png", title: "item 3", desc: "description here", img: "./assets/site.png" } ] const handleClick = (way) => { way === "left" ? setCurrentSlide(currentSlide > 0 ? currentSlide-1 : 2) : setCurrentSlide(currentSlide
{data.map((d) => (

{d.title}

{d.desc}

Projects
))}
handleClick("left")}/> handleClick()} /> ) }
